text: Valerie Jean Foushee (n√©e Paige; born May 7, 1956) is an American politician. She is a member of the United States House of Representatives for North Carolina's 4th congressional district since 2023. She was a Democratic member of the North Carolina Senate. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from North Carolina Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Chapel Hill, North Carolina Category:African-American politicians
title: Valerie Foushee
